ailments.name: Burn
ailments.description: Fire damage over time. All fire damage inflicts Burn.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison damage over time. Stacks infinitely.

weapons.name: Pyromancy Orb
weapons.description: Grants a flame orbital dealing fire damage and inflicting Burn. Pyromancer starting equipment.

weapons.name: Fire Fang
weapons.description: Ranged fire weapon. Disables non-quiver offhand items.

weapons.name: Firebomb Codex
weapons.description: Spawns a firebomb totem that deals fire damage and inflicts Burn.

weapons.name: Flameberge
weapons.description: Heavy fire sword. All fire damage is elemental and inflicts Burn.

weapons.name: Inferno Orb Wand
weapons.description: Spawns inferno orbs that orbit and deal fire damage.

weapons.name: Ice Fang
weapons.description: Ranged cold weapon. Inflicts Chill on hit.

weapons.name: Frostbite Staff
weapons.description: Magic cold staff. All cold damage inflicts Chill.

weapons.name: Arc Staff
weapons.description: Fires arcs of lightning that chain between enemies.

enchantments.name: Incinerating
enchantments.effect: x1.25 Burn Damage (requires Fire Damage on weapon)

enchantments.name: Glacial
enchantments.effect: x1.25 Chill Effect (requires Cold Damage on weapon)

enchantments.name: Charged
enchantments.effect: x1.25 Shock Effect (requires Lightning Damage on weapon)
